description: Retrieves information about an asset composite model (also known as an asset component). An AssetCompositeModel is an instance of an AssetModelCompositeModel. If you want to see information about the model this is based on, call DescribeAssetModelCompositeModel.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: The ID of the asset. This can be either the actual ID in UUID format, or else externalId: followed by the external ID, if it has one. For more information, see Referencing objects with external IDs in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

parameters.name: assetCompositeModelId
parameters.description: The ID of a composite model on this asset. This can be either the actual ID in UUID format, or else externalId: followed by the external ID, if it has one. For more information, see Referencing objects with external IDs in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: assetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset, in UUID format. This ID uniquely identifies the asset within IoT SiteWise and can be used with other IoT SiteWise APIs.

nested_items.name: assetCompositeModelId
nested_items.description: The ID of a composite model on this asset.

nested_items.name: assetCompositeModelExternalId
nested_items.description: An external ID to assign to the asset model.

nested_items.name: assetCompositeModelPath
nested_items.description: The path to the composite model listing the parent composite models.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the path segment.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the path segment.

nested_items.name: assetCompositeModelName
nested_items.description: The unique, friendly name for the composite model.

nested_items.name: assetCompositeModelDescription
nested_items.description: A description for the composite model.

nested_items.name: assetCompositeModelType
nested_items.description: The composite model type. Valid values are AWS/ALARM, CUSTOM, or AWS/L4E_ANOMALY.

nested_items.name: assetCompositeModelProperties
nested_items.description: The property definitions of the composite model that was used to create the asset.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset property.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the property.

nested_items.name: alias
nested_items.description: The alias that identifies the property, such as an OPC-UA server data stream path (for example, /company/windfarm/3/turbine/7/temperature). For more information, see Mapping industrial data streams to asset properties in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: notification
nested_items.description: The asset property's notification topic and state. For more information, see UpdateAssetProperty.

nested_items.name: topic
nested_items.description: The MQTT topic to which IoT SiteWise publishes property value update notifications.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current notification state.

nested_items.name: dataType
nested_items.description: The data type of the asset property.

nested_items.name: dataTypeSpec
nested_items.description: The data type of the structure for this property. This parameter exists on properties that have the STRUCT data type.

nested_items.name: unit
nested_items.description: The unit (such as Newtons or RPM) of the asset property.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The structured path to the property from the root of the asset.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the path segment.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the path segment.

nested_items.name: externalId
nested_items.description: The external ID of the asset property. For more information, see Using external IDs in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: assetCompositeModelSummaries
nested_items.description: The list of composite model summaries.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the composite model that this summary describes.

nested_items.name: externalId
nested_items.description: An external ID to assign to the asset model.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the composite model that this summary describes.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of asset model.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the composite model that this summary describes.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The path that includes all the components of the asset model for the asset.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the path segment.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the path segment.

nested_items.name: actionDefinitions
nested_items.description: The available actions for a composite model on this asset.

nested_items.name: actionDefinitionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the action definition.

nested_items.name: actionName
nested_items.description: The name of the action definition.

nested_items.name: actionType
nested_items.description: The type of the action definition.
